metadata.name: Surfer
metadata.description:
The 'In Flow' series is about the fact that we are constantly plugged into the digital flow of information and contemporary art lives and circulates in it as well.
The nomadic characters are furrowing the fluid world, flooded by water. They navigate strange floating vehicles, constantly holding gadgets in their hands, which allow them to surf and stay in the flow.

4096  x  6144
